backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing role-based access control with user profile management, allowlist gating, and admin endpoints for managing user roles (guest, user, admin).
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report placeholder with no features documented.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files describing authentication flow, Valentine-themed UI components, gift screens, and styling configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining Valentine-themed design tokens for light and dark modes using CSS custom properties.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script reference for the Valentine's Day application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component orchestrating authentication, allowlist checking, and conditional rendering of sign-in, access denied, or Valentine flow screens with loading states.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Screen displayed to authenticated users not on the allowlist, showing access denial message with logout functionality.
frontend/src/components/auth/SignInScree: Sign-in screen with Internet Identity login button and Valentine-themed UI featuring animated hearts.
frontend/src/components/layout/Valentine: Shared layout wrapper providing Valentine-themed background, floating decorative hearts, main content container, and footer with attribution.
frontend/src/features/valentine/gifts/Gi: Displays an audio player for a song with play/pause controls, error handling, and scrollable lyrics in Punjabi. Uses Lucide icons and shadcn/ui components.
Renders a static virtual bouquet gift card displaying a flower image with decorative icons and a romantic message.
Provides an editable heartfelt message with a reveal/hide toggle, allowing users to customize the default Valentine's message before displaying it in a styled card.
Displays a romantic Hindi poem in a decorative card with gradient backgrounds, heart icons, and emphasized typography.
frontend/src/features/valentine/GiftsScr: Gift selection screen displaying four gift cards with navigation to individual gift components (song, bouquet, message, poem) and back navigation.
frontend/src/features/valentine/Question: Valentine question screen with "Yes" button advancing to gifts and "No" button triggering a 1.5-second red alarm effect (shake, glow, flash) without navigation.
frontend/src/features/valentine/Valentin: State machine component managing flow between question screen and gifts screen based on user interaction.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using Internet Identity, with automatic query invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAllowlistGate.ts: Hook that checks if the current authenticated user is on the allowlist by querying the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for login/logout functionality using DFINITY's AuthClient with delegation identity management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and saving user profiles via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a Valentine's Day color theme (warm cream and romantic red) for both light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color schemes using OKLCH color space, container settings, border radius variables, custom animations (accordion, alarm shake/flash), and font families.
project_state.json: Project state metadata indicating pending feature requests to restore the codebase to Version 3, with schema version 1.0.0 and project state version 5.
